1371: Folqui was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1371.
1374: Lost sibling Rembrandus in 1374 when Rembrandus was 2.
1390: Lost mother at the age of 19.
1394: Got married to Reymbernus at age 24 in 1394.
Folqui moved to Lievevrouwe kerch.B.3 after marriage.
Moved in with husband Reymbernus's family after marriage.
1395: Gave birth to Victoria in 1395 at age 24.
Lost father at the age of 24.
1396: Gave birth to Amalburga in 1396 at age 25.
1399: Gave birth to Wolcout in 1399 at age 28.
